original_title: Austin Powers' Electric Psychedelic Pussycat Swingers Club
overview: Austin Powers presents his own kind of shagadellic swinging shindig courtesy of MTV to promote his movie, Austin Powers International Man of Mystery. Edited in the style of 'Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In', Austin shows clips from his film, including a spotlight on Elizabeth Hurley and explains how he is adjusting to the nineties after being frozen for thirty years.
title: Austin Powers' Electric Psychedelic Pussycat Swingers Club
